title: Apollo 11
description: ”One small step for [a] man, one giant leap for mankind.”

title: World Wide Web free to anyone
description: On 30 April 1993, CERN announced that the World Wide Web would be free to anyone, with no fees due.

title: E = mc2
description: Albert Einstein submits his paper ”Does the Inertia of a Body Depend Upon Its Energy Content?” in which he develops an argument for the famous equation E = mc2.
